╭── ​ᓚᕠᗢ NattyUI ANSI Attributes ──╶╴╴
│ 
│ NattyUI supports all well known attributes like bold, italic, underline,
│ blink, invert and strike. Other attributes like faint, double underline, curly
│ underline, dotted underline, dashed underline, rapid_blink, framed, encircled,
│ overlined and proportional are not widely used but also supported.
│ Alternative fonts are mostly completely ignored: primary_font, fraktur, font1,
│ font2, font3, font4, font5, font6, font7, font8, font9.
╰────╶╴╴
